Hello! My name is Reza Fahlevi, 25 years old, Bachelor of Information Engineering - GPA 3.72 / 4.0 (Pamulang University). I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. Experienced Web & Mobile Developer with over 6 years of expertise in designing, developing, and optimizing high-performing web and mobile applications. Demonstrates strong problem-solving abilities and a collaborative approach, thriving in both team and independent work environments.

Fast forward to today, and I have the privilege of working for a health technology company. My primary focus today is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a wide range of clients.
